about.name: About us
about.desc: We are - A full-service marketing agency. <br \/>Our team combines strategy, creativity and analytics, <br \/>to help your business grow faster than the competition. <br \/>We understand the market and speak the language of numbers, <br \/>not promises

about_1.name: In the Digital-industry
about_1.desc: And this is our foundation. Together with the market, we have traveled the path from the first <br \/>Digital experiments to advanced analytics and automation. <br \/>Now this experience works for you

about_2.name: Completed projects in 5 countries
about_2.desc: During this time we have accumulated experience in various niches <br \/>with companies of any scale - from local startups <br \/>to international brands

about_3.name: Customer Satisfaction Index
about_3.desc: This indicator - is the result of an individual approach <br \/>and complete immersion in each project

case_3.name: CETUS PROTOCOL

service.name: Services
service.desc: A complete list of marketing tools and practices to scaling your business <br \/>and promoting a personal brand

service_1.desc: Social media, lead generation, <br \/>(PPC, targeted ads), online reputation <br \/>management (ORM), PR, email marketing, <br \/>and other tools

service_2.desc: Websites, mobile apps, <br \/>CRM systems, Telegram bots, <br \/>web design, presentations

service_3.desc: Thematic copywriting, <br \/>photo and video content, <br \/>AI-Generated content

team.name: Join <br \/>the team
